description.en: Leap and Avoid 2 is a thrilling platform adventure where you guide a nimble white ball through treacherous caves and high-tech labs. Navigate white platforms, dodge the deadly black ones, and uncover hidden paths brimming with coins.
description.zh: 跳跃躲避2是一款惊险的平台冒险游戏，你需要引导一个灵活的白球穿越危险的洞穴和高科技实验室。在白色平台上导航，躲避致命的黑色平台，发现充满金币的隐藏路径。

en: Use arrow keys or A and D to move the ball
Navigate white platforms safely
Avoid deadly black platforms
Collect coins to unlock upgrades
Use R to restart and P to pause
zh: 使用方向键或A和D移动球体
安全地在白色平台上导航
避开致命的黑色平台
收集金币解锁升级
使用R重新开始，P暂停游戏

en: Thrilling platform adventure gameplay
Treacherous caves and high-tech labs
Hidden paths with coin rewards
Upgrade system with shields and speed boosts
Leaderboard competition
zh: 惊险的平台冒险玩法
危险的洞穴和高科技实验室
带有金币奖励的隐藏路径
包含护盾和速度提升的升级系统
排行榜竞争

en: Time your movements carefully on platforms
Look for hidden coin paths
Use upgrades strategically
Practice makes perfect for difficult sections
zh: 在平台上仔细掌握移动时机
寻找隐藏的金币路径
策略性地使用升级
多练习困难部分

description.en: Ragdoll Archers is an archery game featuring bow and arrow-equipped stickmen with ragdoll physics. Fire arrows at a range of opponents while earning points to upgrade your abilities and ammunition.
description.zh: 布娃娃弓箭手是一款射箭游戏，具有配备弓箭的火柴人和布娃娃物理效果。向各种对手射箭，同时赚取积分来升级你的能力和弹药。

en: Use left mouse button to control the archer
Use spacebar to jump
Shoot apples to replenish health and stamina
Aim carefully before firing
Collect skulls to upgrade abilities
zh: 使用鼠标左键控制弓箭手
使用空格键跳跃
射击苹果来补充生命值和体力
射击前仔细瞄准
收集骷髅升级能力

en: Realistic ragdoll physics
Various arrow types and upgrades
Two-player co-op and PvP modes
Boss battles and challenging opponents
Upgrade system using skulls currency
zh: 真实的布娃娃物理效果
各种箭矢类型和升级
双人合作和PvP模式
Boss战和挑战性对手
使用骷髅货币的升级系统

en: Line up your shots carefully before firing
Collect flying apples to restore health/stamina
Red apples restore health, green restore stamina
Golden apples restore both health and stamina
Upgrade your abilities using earned skulls
zh: 射击前仔细瞄准
收集飞行的苹果来恢复生命值/体力
红苹果恢复生命值，绿苹果恢复体力
金苹果同时恢复生命值和体力
使用获得的骷髅升级你的能力

description.en: Count Masters: Stickman Games is a fast-paced running game where you gather a growing army of stickmen to clash against rival crowds. Navigate through obstacles, choose the best paths to multiply your numbers, and lead your team to victory.
description.zh: 计数大师：火柴人游戏是一款快节奏的跑酷游戏，你需要聚集不断增长的火柴人军队来对抗敌对人群。穿越障碍，选择最佳路径来增加你的数量，带领团队走向胜利。

en: Move the character by moving the mouse left or right
Choose gates that give you the best numbers
Avoid red gates and dangerous traps
Time your attacks against enemies
Collect coins to upgrade your abilities
zh: 通过左右移动鼠标来移动角色
选择能给你最佳数量的门
避开红色门和危险陷阱
把握攻击敌人的时机
收集金币升级你的能力

en: Fast-paced 3D runner with epic crowd battles
Fun strategy and math choices with every gate
Boss fights and challenging traps
Colorful, satisfying visuals and smooth controls
Upgrade system for starting crowd and gate bonuses
zh: 快节奏3D跑酷与史诗人群战斗
每个门都有有趣的策略和数学选择
Boss战和挑战性陷阱
丰富多彩、令人满意的视觉效果和流畅控制
起始人群和门奖励的升级系统

en: Don't just rush forward—choose gates strategically
Avoid red gates that shrink your army
Upgrade your starting crowd early
Watch enemy movements and time attacks
Save coins between runs for upgrades
zh: 不要只是向前冲——策略性地选择门
避开会缩小你军队的红色门
尽早升级你的起始人群
观察敌人动作并把握攻击时机
在跑步间隙保存金币用于升级

description.en: BuildNow GG is an online build-and-shoot game featuring various game modes, weapons, and maps. Build and battle your way to the top of the leaderboard and hone your skills in offline training mode.
description.zh: 建造大师是一款在线建造射击游戏，具有各种游戏模式、武器和地图。建造和战斗，登上排行榜榜首，在离线训练模式中磨练你的技能。

en: WASD or arrow keys to move, Space to jump
Q = wall, C = floor, V = ramp, Left shift = roof
Left-click to fire, Right-click to aim
Use numbers 1-5 to switch weapons
F to edit buildings, B for emotes
zh: WASD或方向键移动，空格跳跃
Q=墙，C=地板，V=斜坡，左Shift=屋顶
左键射击，右键瞄准
使用数字1-5切换武器
F编辑建筑，B表情

en: 5 action-packed game modes
Build and battle mechanics
Play privately with up to 6 players
Fully customizable controls and graphics
Offline training mode available
zh: 5种动作丰富的游戏模式
建造和战斗机制
最多6人私人游戏
完全可定制的控制和图形
可用的离线训练模式

en: Practice building in aim training mode
Master the quick edit controls
Use cover while reloading
Learn weapon switching for different situations
Build defensively when under fire
zh: 在瞄准训练模式中练习建造
掌握快速编辑控制
重新装弹时使用掩护
学习在不同情况下切换武器
受到攻击时进行防御性建造

description.en: Immortal: Dark Slayer is a top-down action RPG that puts you in the armor of a Fallen Knight, battling to purge the realm of demons, the undead, and creeping chaos. Drawing inspiration from the punishing combat of Dark Souls and Elden Ring, it delivers the same gritty challenge, reimagined with a top-down perspective and streamlined controls.
description.zh: 不朽：黑暗杀手是一款俯视角动作RPG游戏，你将扮演堕落骑士，战斗清除恶魔、亡灵和蔓延的混沌。游戏汲取了黑暗之魂和艾尔登法环的惩罚性战斗灵感，以俯视角度和简化控制重新诠释了同样严峻的挑战。

en: Use WASD or arrow keys to move your character
Left mouse button to interact with in-game UI
Engage in strategic combat against demons and undead
Explore the dark realm and uncover secrets
Upgrade your equipment and abilities
zh: 使用WASD或方向键移动角色
左键点击与游戏UI交互
与恶魔和亡灵进行策略性战斗
探索黑暗领域并发现秘密
升级装备和能力

en: Dark Souls-inspired challenging combat
Top-down perspective with streamlined controls
Battle demons, undead, and chaotic forces
Rich RPG progression system
Atmospheric dark fantasy setting
zh: 黑暗之魂风格的挑战性战斗
俯视角度配合简化控制
与恶魔、亡灵和混沌力量战斗
丰富的RPG成长系统
氛围浓厚的黑暗奇幻设定

en: Study enemy attack patterns before engaging
Manage your resources carefully in combat
Explore thoroughly to find better equipment
Learn to time your attacks and dodges
Don't rush - patience is key to survival
zh: 交战前仔细观察敌人的攻击模式
在战斗中谨慎管理资源
彻底探索以找到更好的装备
学会把握攻击和闪避的时机
不要急躁 - 耐心是生存的关键

description.en: Explore outer space in Run 3. Run 3 is an incredibly addicting, endless runner-type action/platforming game in which you play as a little grey alien. The little alien is trespassing in an architecturally challenged area that is floating in space.
description.zh: 在跑酷3中探索外太空。跑酷3是一款极其令人上瘾的无尽跑酷类动作/平台游戏，你将扮演一个小灰色外星人。这个小外星人正在一个漂浮在太空中建筑结构奇特的区域中穿行。

en: Use SPACE or UP Arrow to jump
Use A or LEFT Arrow to move left
Use D or RIGHT Arrow to move right
Avoid falling into holes in space
Navigate through the challenging tunnel system
zh: 使用空格键或上方向键跳跃
使用A键或左方向键向左移动
使用D键或右方向键向右移动
避免掉入太空中的洞穴
在充满挑战的隧道系统中导航

en: Addictive endless runner gameplay
Unique space tunnel environment
Multiple characters to unlock
Challenging gravity-defying mechanics
Progressive difficulty levels
zh: 令人上瘾的无尽跑酷玩法
独特的太空隧道环境
多个可解锁角色
挑战性的反重力机制
渐进式难度等级

en: Watch your step - one wrong move sends you to space
Learn the tunnel layouts for better navigation
Time your jumps carefully
Try different characters for varied gameplay
Practice makes perfect in this challenging runner
zh: 小心脚下 - 一步走错就会飘向太空
学习隧道布局以便更好地导航
仔细把握跳跃时机
尝试不同角色体验多样玩法
在这个充满挑战的跑酷游戏中熟能生巧

description.en: Paper Minecraft is an adventure game that brings the legendary Minecraft into a 2D world. Choose your character and preferred game mode to jump into the fun! This Scratch game features the classic survival and creative modes from the original Minecraft game.
description.zh: 纸片我的世界是一款冒险游戏，将传奇的Minecraft带入2D世界。选择你的角色和喜欢的游戏模式开始游戏！这款Scratch游戏具有原版Minecraft游戏的经典生存和创造模式。

en: Use AD or left/right arrow keys to move
Use W or up arrow key to jump
Left-click to dig or place blocks
Press E to open inventory or chests
Press F to eat and hold an item
Use Space to split items in crafting menu
zh: 使用AD或左右方向键移动
使用W或上方向键跳跃
左键点击挖掘或放置方块
按E键打开背包或箱子
按F键吃东西和拿取物品
在合成菜单中使用空格键分割物品

en: 2D version of the classic Minecraft experience
Both survival and creative game modes
Block building and mining mechanics
Character customization options
Familiar Minecraft-style gameplay
zh: 经典Minecraft体验的2D版本
生存和创造两种游戏模式
方块建造和挖掘机制
角色自定义选项
熟悉的Minecraft风格玩法

en: Start by gathering basic resources like wood and stone
Build shelter before nightfall in survival mode
Experiment with different block combinations
Use creative mode to practice building techniques
Explore the world to find rare materials
zh: 从收集木材和石头等基础资源开始
在生存模式中天黑前建造庇护所
尝试不同的方块组合
使用创造模式练习建造技巧
探索世界寻找稀有材料

description.en: Voxiom.io is a 3D real-time multiplayer first-person voxel shooter featuring destructible maps. The game is inspired by popular titles, such as Minecraft, Fortnite, Counter-Strike, and Call of Duty. Currently, the game features 4 game modes: capture the gems, battle royale, survival, and free-for-all.
description.zh: 体素大战是一款3D实时多人第一人称体素射击游戏，具有可破坏的地图。游戏灵感来自Minecraft、堡垒之夜、反恐精英和使命召唤等热门游戏。目前游戏包含4种游戏模式：夺取宝石、大逃杀、生存和自由混战。

en: Use WASD to move, Space to jump
Hold C to crouch, Hold Shift to sprint
Left mouse button for primary action (shoot/use item)
Right mouse button or F for secondary action
Press X to open inventory
Hold Tab to view map
zh: 使用WASD移动，空格键跳跃
按住C蹲下，按住Shift冲刺
左键进行主要动作（射击/使用物品）
右键或F键进行次要动作
按X键打开背包
按住Tab键查看地图

en: 3D voxel-based destructible environments
Multiple game modes including Battle Royale
Real-time multiplayer combat
Building and crafting mechanics
Inspired by popular FPS and survival games
zh: 3D体素可破坏环境
包括大逃杀在内的多种游戏模式
实时多人战斗
建造和合成机制
受热门FPS和生存游戏启发

en: Use the destructible environment to your advantage
Build cover and strategic positions
Learn the different game modes and their objectives
Manage your inventory and resources wisely
Practice your aim and movement in free-for-all mode
zh: 利用可破坏环境获得优势
建造掩护和战略位置
学习不同游戏模式及其目标
明智地管理背包和资源
在自由混战模式中练习瞄准和移动
